title: System Settings
description: Manage core system configurations, including site, security, subscription, invite commission, nodes, email, and notifications

server.title: Server Configuration
server.description: Configure node communication and synchronization settings, including communication keys, polling intervals, load balancing and other advanced options.

server_pull_interval.title: Node Pull Action Polling Interval
server_pull_interval.description: The frequency at which nodes retrieve data from the panel.

server_push_interval.title: Node Push Action Polling Interval
server_push_interval.description: The frequency at which nodes push data to the panel.

device_limit_mode.title: Device Limit Mode
device_limit_mode.description: In relaxed mode, using multiple nodes from the same IP address counts as one device.

invite.title: Invitation & Commission Settings
invite.description: Configure invitation registration and commission related settings.

invite_force.title: Enable Forced Invitation
invite_force.description: When enabled, only invited users can register.

invite_commission.title: Invitation Commission Percentage
invite_commission.description: Default global commission distribution ratio, you can configure individual ratios in user management.

invite_gen_limit.title: Invitation Code Generation Limit
invite_gen_limit.description: Maximum number of invitation codes a user can create

invite_never_expire.title: Never Expire Invitation Code
invite_never_expire.description: When enabled, invitation codes will not expire after use, otherwise they will expire after being used.

commission_first_time.title: First-time Commission Only
commission_first_time.description: When enabled, commission will only be generated on the first payment of the invitee, can be configured individually in user management.

commission_auto_check.title: Automatic Commission Confirmation
commission_auto_check.description: When enabled, commission will be automatically confirmed 3 days after order completion.

commission_withdraw_limit.title: Withdrawal Threshold (Yuan)
commission_withdraw_limit.description: Withdrawal requests below this threshold will not be submitted.

commission_withdraw_method.title: Withdrawal Methods
commission_withdraw_method.description: Supported withdrawal methods, separate multiple methods with commas.
commission_withdraw_method.placeholder: Enter withdrawal methods, separate with commas

withdraw_close.title: Disable Withdrawals
withdraw_close.description: When enabled, users will be prohibited from requesting withdrawals, and invitation commissions will go directly to user balance.

commission_distribution.title: Three-level Distribution
commission_distribution.description: When enabled, commission will be split according to the three set ratios, total should not exceed 100%.

site.title: Site Settings
site.description: Configure basic site information, including site name, description, currency unit, and other core settings.

siteName.label: Site Name
siteName.description: Used where site name needs to be displayed.

siteDescription.label: Site Description
siteDescription.description: Used where site description needs to be displayed.

siteUrl.label: Site URL
siteUrl.placeholder: Please enter site URL, without trailing /
siteUrl.description: Current website URL, will be used in emails and other places where URL is needed.

forceHttps.label: Force HTTPS
forceHttps.description: Need to enable when the site is not using HTTPS but CDN or reverse proxy has forced HTTPS.

logo.label: LOGO
logo.placeholder: Please enter LOGO URL, without trailing /
logo.description: Used where LOGO needs to be displayed.

subscribeUrl.label: Subscribe URL
subscribeUrl.placeholder: Used for subscription, multiple URLs separated by ','. Leave empty to use site URL.
subscribeUrl.description: Used for subscription, leave empty to use site URL.

tosUrl.label: Terms of Service (TOS) URL
tosUrl.placeholder: Please enter TOS URL, without trailing /
tosUrl.description: Used to link to Terms of Service (TOS)

stopRegister.label: Stop New User Registration
stopRegister.description: When enabled, no one will be able to register.

tryOut.label: Registration Trial
tryOut.description: Select the subscription for trial, if no options please add in subscription management first.

currency.label: Currency Unit
currency.description: For display only, changing this will affect all currency units in the system.

currencySymbol.label: Currency Symbol
currencySymbol.description: For display only, changing this will affect all currency symbols in the system.

safe.title: Security Settings
safe.description: Configure system security options, including login verification, password policies, and API access settings.

emailVerify.label: Email Verification
emailVerify.description: When enabled, users will be required to verify their email.

gmailLimit.label: Disable Gmail Aliases
gmailLimit.description: When enabled, Gmail aliases will not be allowed to register.

safeMode.label: Safe Mode
safeMode.description: When enabled, accessing the site through domains other than the site URL will be blocked with 403.

securePath.label: Admin Path
securePath.description: Admin management path, changing this will modify the original admin path

emailWhitelist.label: Email Suffix Whitelist
emailWhitelist.description: When enabled, only email suffixes in the list will be allowed to register.

suffixes.label: Email Suffixes
suffixes.placeholder: Enter email suffixes, one per line
suffixes.description: Enter the allowed email suffixes, one per line

enable.label: Enable reCAPTCHA
enable.description: When enabled, users will need to pass reCAPTCHA verification when registering.

enable.label: IP Registration Limit
enable.description: When enabled, the number of registrations from the same IP will be limited.

count.label: Registration Count
count.description: Maximum number of registrations allowed from the same IP

expire.label: Limit Duration
expire.description: Duration of the registration limit in hours

enable.label: Password Attempt Limit
enable.description: When enabled, the number of password attempts will be limited.

count.label: Attempt Count
count.description: Maximum number of password attempts allowed

expire.label: Lock Duration
expire.description: Duration of the account lock in hours

subscribe.title: Subscription Settings
subscribe.description: Manage subscription-related configurations, including subscription link format, update frequency, traffic statistics, and other settings.

plan_change_enable.title: Allow Subscription Changes
plan_change_enable.description: When enabled, users will be able to change their subscription plans.

reset_traffic_method.title: Monthly Traffic Reset Method
reset_traffic_method.description: Global traffic reset method, defaults to the 1st of each month. Can be set individually for subscriptions in subscription management.

surplus_enable.title: Enable Deduction Plan
surplus_enable.description: When enabled, the system will deduct from the original subscription when users change subscriptions, refer to documentation for details.

new_order_event.title: Trigger Event on New Subscription
new_order_event.description: This task will be triggered when a new subscription is completed.

renew_order_event.title: Trigger Event on Subscription Renewal
renew_order_event.description: This task will be triggered when a subscription renewal is completed.

change_order_event.title: Trigger Event on Subscription Change
change_order_event.description: This task will be triggered when a subscription change is completed.

subscribe_path.title: Subscription Path
subscribe_path.description: Subscription path, modifying will change the original subscribe path

show_info_to_server.title: Show Subscription Info in Nodes
show_info_to_server.description: When enabled, subscription information will be output when users subscribe to nodes.

show_protocol_to_server.title: Show Protocol in Node Names
show_protocol_to_server.description: When enabled, subscription lines will include protocol names (e.g., [Hy2]Hong Kong)

columns.renew_tooltip: Whether existing users can renew when the subscription stops selling
columns.name: Name

delete_confirm.title: Confirm Delete
delete_confirm.description: This action will permanently delete this subscription and cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to continue?

reset_method.label: Traffic Reset Method
reset_method.description: Set how subscription traffic is reset, different methods affect how user traffic is calculated

content.label: Plan Description
content.description: Supports Markdown format, you can use headings, lists, bold, italic and other styles to beautify the content

template.tooltip: Click to use preset plan description template

page.description: Here you can configure subscription plans, including adding, deleting, and editing operations.

email.title: Email Settings
email.description: Configure system email service for sending verification codes, password resets, and notifications, supporting various SMTP providers.

email_password.title: SMTP Password
email_password.description: SMTP authentication password or application-specific password

email_template.title: Email Template
email_template.description: You can check the documentation for how to customize email templates

remind_mail.title: Email Reminders
remind_mail.description: When enabled, users will receive email notifications when their subscription is about to expire or when traffic is running low.

test.title: Send Test Email
test.description: Send a test email to verify the configuration

telegram.title: Telegram Settings
telegram.description: Configure Telegram bot functionality for user notifications, account binding, and command interactions.

bot_token.title: Bot Token
bot_token.description: Please enter the token provided by Botfather.

webhook.title: Set Webhook
webhook.description: Set up webhook for the bot. Without setting it, you won't receive Telegram notifications.

bot_enable.title: Enable Bot Notifications
bot_enable.description: When enabled, the bot will send basic notifications to administrators and users who have bound their Telegram accounts.

discuss_link.title: Group Link
discuss_link.description: Once filled in, it will be displayed on the user side or used where needed.

app.title: APP Settings
app.description: Manage mobile application configurations, including API interfaces, version control, and push notifications.

version.title: Windows Version
version.description: Current version number of Windows client

version.title: macOS Version
version.description: Current version number of macOS client

version.title: Android Version
version.description: Current version number of Android client
